entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yellowknife
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:10 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -31.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yellowknife Airport 8:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -31.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -34.5°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
